name: Cosmosis (Dimitri Passade)
description:
Space is it Boring ?

Nope, it's magnificent ,thank goodness .

The Sun will die in the Next 5 billion years.

 Any of you ,whom are about to play this game ,won't be there by then.

Blackholes parading about , don't be scared you won't see any.

FIN HAHA

-Everything was done by yours truly , well except for the Music of course 

Thanks ,On top of the world - Imagine Dragons
